column5: Can anyone suggest a place to leave the truck and trailer for a couple days. I know you cant leave at it the parks canada dock. Also maybe a launch to use that might include  parking while camping on the island? thanks
Picnic Island Campground has pay parking.
Great camping in the island - been some nuisance bears there lately.
Village Marina. If it was just the truck with no trailer, I would say park it on bluewater road in front of the hockey rink.
Brandy's Island Marina fits your bill. Check their website
